title: Frankolala
author: Frankolala
content: As a responsible gambler, I know we don't let gambling change our lifestyle. If today is your luckiest day ever in gambling,on your first game you won the sum of $50 000.First, will you quit the game immediately and withdraw all your funds or will you play for awhile because you are excited.Second, will you use this money to upgrade your lifestyle i.e living big and showing off,even relocating to a better environment and forget about your old friends in your former neighborhood ? Or will you just remain quiet,happy and living a your normal way of life but investing the money into something profitable without telling anyone ?

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Unfortunately, what's happening more often; greed prevails. Winning would push a gambler to play more. Gambler's Fallacy I guess? It would be easy to have idea of such; quitting once you win a reasonable amount to quit, but that would be hard to be honest. A money earned easily is usually spent quickly as well. But ofcourse if you can simply show discipline, it would be much better . It is not impossible in the first place, it is just that such thing is not present to most of us, let us accept that. Money is too powerful that it can alter our ambitions, plans, and ideas.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Forget your old friends? I don't know what movie you have been watching. That doesn't happen. Just live normally. $50k is a small amount when you buy what you really desire.But yes I might just quit playing for a few days, a week, or a month and $50K can be spent in just a day actually. Buying 2BTC and you will have 10k left. That I guess I can use it for better tings like storing food to prepare for high costs because of inflation.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: If you win such big amount of money, the best is to quite gambling, or be determined and never spend more money in gambling. You can use $50000 to establish a business which can bring you more money. Know that gambling is not for making money, it was just an opportunity, and the opportunity may not be more than once as this kind of opportunity can be just once in lifetime, best to grab it by using the money for investment and businesses and just gamble with very low amount of money as usual for you not to go from rich to broke again.

comments.author: Cling18
comments.body: I'll withdraw it right away and stop betting for a while since I already hit my target profit. But I don't think leaving everything behind including your old friends will be a good idea. You can live a comfortable life without forgetting who you really are and where you're from. We can change our lifestyle but we should not make money the center of our lives that we will forget the people who stayed by our side on our darkest days.

comments.author: swogerino

If today is your luckiest day ever in gambling,on your first game you won the sum of $50 000.First, will you quit the game immediately and withdraw all your funds or will you play for awhile because you are excited.Second, will you use this money to upgrade your lifestyle i.e living big and showing off,even relocating to a better environment and forget about your old friends in your former neighborhood ? Or will you just remain quiet,happy and living a your normal way of life but investing the money into something profitable without telling anyone ?I think very few people here have won 50.000 dollars from gambling in their first game,I mean from average gamblers and I am not talking about whales,those are different species.If I win though it is simple what I would do,immediately withdraw 40.000 or 45.000 dollars but mostly 40.000 dollars and the rest of that 10.000 dollars I would bet max bet on my favorite slot machines.In the worst case I would lose that 10.000 dollars and in the best possible scenario since I am playing with max bet if I won the bonus round in a slot machine which makes your bet x100 it means I would be playing a few spins with 10.000x bet because max bet in most slots is 100 and multiplied by 100 is 10.000 as a bet.Winning any 5 of a kind combination that would bring a really good amount of money and winning it a couple of times would give me 100.000 dollars as a minimum.I would continue to live a quite life and find some opportunities to invest some money online or buy a few non luxury things nowadays.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: Will everyone who earns money from big wins always get a change in his life?If you are a player having fun at the casino, I think you will withdraw most of your profits. and keep playing with your capital until it runs out. it's not a defeat, but there is a certain satisfaction that you will get.one big win, sometimes it won't satisfy you when you just played one round. there is only curiosity to win more.withdraw the winnings and continue to have fun at the casino. after that just enjoy the victory with what we want.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Now for as a gambler I don't really like what I sees or gain from gambling affect my life style, so about such amount of money winning from any gambling platform, what I would do is to part the money and invest in real life business because online investment is not as stable as physical business. I would also leave about 5Â  percentage of my wager from the initial winning. Now I don't even announced to friends if you hit such amount of money because is a huge amount compared to our local currency so I will always play safe and cool, as I always said I do have a charity account maybe I would help from the account.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: If i win $50k i would stay on the site to have fun with $1k, and if i lose that i would walk away with my profit and use that money as you mention to upgrade my life style, you know, a new car, a bigger house and maybe i would invest part of that in a business.The last time i had a huge win was years ago, the amount wasn't that big, but 0.1BTC profit was a nice amount to have some good time.

By the way 50K is not a very big value, I personally hope to win 1M because it will change my whole life.

comments.author: PawGo
comments.body: First at all - it depends how do you define "big win". It is hard to talk about a fixed amounts, but we may say that big win is not when you double - triple your bankroll. If your bankroll would be multiplied x10, then it is a different story. Honestly speaking I do not believe that it that case people stop gambling, as it is just a "proof" they may win, so the will do it again and again. And it is a clear way to go back to 0... But if you decide to keep 5-10-15% for gambling and withdraw the rest, to use it in some clever way in real life - then yes, it may bring something good.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: Winning such volume of money is a great happiness so for that day I won't be active after winning maybe I will distance the site for about 2 to 3 days of my winning then plan with my family or most closely elder brother before making withdrawal, I will check their maximum withdrawal limit before engaging myself. I will stay away from friends because friends not all that are happy with you for winning such amount money.

comments.author: madnessteat
comments.body: This money is enough to buy real estate in my country. For example, you can buy a one-room apartment and rent it out, thereby gradually getting invested money. Another good option, in my opinion, is to invest half of my winnings in promising cryptocurrencies for 5-10 years, and leave the rest in fiat money just in case. This option is more risky than buying real estate, but it can bring huge profits.

comments.author: virasisog
comments.body: I wilk use that amount wisely without hurting my old friends. I would actually love to spend a portion of it to celebrate with them. The money would be nothing if you will only be greedy and selfish. I'll allocate some portion of it to invest in crypto and some for putting up a small business. Sharing what we have sometimes could give us happiness that money could buy but of course, we must always leave enough for ourselves.

comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on October 20, 2022, 01:23:48 PMAs a responsible gambler, I know we don't let gambling change our lifestyle. If today is your luckiest day ever in gambling,on your first game you won the sum of $50 000.First, will you quit the game immediately and withdraw all your funds or will you play for awhile because you are excited.You are free to do after winning big but a most important step to do is withdrawal your initial capital. You must successfully withdraw it for two reasonsProtect your initial capital and avoid to lose it all by gamblingTo test the casino that even you win big, they allow you to withdraw money. It helps you to deposit more money to the casino and at the end, you get scammed and lose all money in your account.QuoteSecond, will you use this money to upgrade your lifestyle i.e living big and showing off,even relocating to a better environment and forget about your old friends in your former neighborhood ? Or will you just remain quiet,happy and living a your normal way of life but investing the money into something profitable without telling anyone ?Using your money from trading or gambling to buy real things and upgrade your life, increase your life quality is great idea and should be done.I have a friend who somewhat won big by gambling but he is not gambling responsibly. So his wife created pressure and forced him to buy to land tiles, build a house on one land tile. You know, he did not stop and after 3 years, I am shocked to know he lost all of such and in serious debt.People who are irresponsible gambling or trading are very hard to change themselves. They can not stop even they lose or win big.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: There is no need to change that behavior because due to big wins we have to continue to live a normal lifestyle but with some money invested I think it's better than an exaggerated lifestyle especially by showing off to everyone there is nothing good.Every time I win, I will stop for a moment to use the money, which is even more useful, including the Bitcoin investment and property I want, when I gamble again, we start normal things with capital at the beginning.But it depends on people's perceptions because we are definitely different in lifestyle so it's your choice.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: It seems that if it happens to me personally, of course I have to choose something like what you say below.Quote from: Frankolala on October 20, 2022, 01:23:48 PMand living a your normal way of life but investing the money into something profitable without telling anyone ?I know gambling is full of mystery and greed, we never know the day and time of our bad luck, for that gambling addicts who remember the risks of gambling are the ones who survive their wins.Of course we here have different thoughts in gambling methods, gambling wins have their own factors in managing their finances and winnings, for sure I'm not sure those who are first involved in gambling can win up to $50k, although there are, those are professional gamblers.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: Depends on the condition of the gambler and if you have become an addict it seems difficult to end the game when you win big, and that will make him feel happy and comfortable. Because he has a very large capital to bet that he can use all at once or gradually to bet, and henceforth I don't know if they will continue to win and will add to their big wins or will lose everything in the end.and I personally will withdraw all of them because $50,000 is a very large amount and I will soon buy the house and its contents and leave a little for gambling capital when I want to bet, and hopefully it will come true and I will get a win or jackpot of $50,000.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on October 20, 2022, 01:23:48 PMAs a responsible gambler, I know we don't let gambling change our lifestyle. If today is your luckiest day ever in gambling,on your first game you won the sum of $50 000.First, will you quit the game immediately and withdraw all your funds or will you play for awhile because you are excited.Second, will you use this money to upgrade your lifestyle i.e living big and showing off,even relocating to a better environment and forget about your old friends in your former neighborhood ? Or will you just remain quiet,happy and living a your normal way of life but investing the money into something profitable without telling anyone ?I don't know which country you live in but $50k won't really upgrade your life style in a meaningful way. Not if you live in a developed country at least. It would help but not much. $50k is probably not even enough to buy a brand new car nowadays.As long as you don't try to win more and leave the table fast, you will be fine. It is the hardest thing for a gambler because he will think "why stop now while I am winning? why not win $100k? just one more round" and you know the rest of the story. The next round he will be $0.
